article_title: Republican Congressman 'refuses to be blackmailed' by GOP hardliners

twitter.description: In the House, two-thirds of Republican lawmakers have been elected since 2010. In the Senate, the average age has dropped by 17 years. That makes Oklahoma Republican Tom Cole—a 12-year House vete...

article_metadata.description: House veteran Tom Cole talks to Fortune about the potential government shutdown and what it will take to make Congress less dysfunctional.
